entries.journal_entry_description: Stop the Rebels from fleeing Hoth on thier transports.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Don't let them get away! Destroy those transports! You'll need to take out a transport's command crew before you can attack the transport.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Dont stop now! Destroy the remaining transports! You'll need to take out a transport's command crew before you can attack the transport.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Major Victory: Destroy 2 More Rebel Transports
